channel.title: Neurophysics on All About Helin Henstridge
channel.description: Recent content in Neurophysics on All About Helin Henstridge

item.title: Research
item.description:
Undergraduate Research

Neurophysics - Dr. William Kristan, UCSD

I designed and executed my own research experiment to measure phototaxis of planarians temporally and spatially, including how their replication affects their phototaxis. I did this by creating varying light gradients for planarians; establishing a system of computers, computer programs, a handheld projector, camera, and microscope; utilizing microscopy techniques to record the planarians movement and analyze their phototaxis after experimentation.

Materials Physics - Dr. Olivia Graeve, UCSD

I collaborated in writing a literature review about optical, magnetic, and electrical properties of ceramic metal oxides by reading, summarizing and articulating to peers and supervisors the relevant conclusions and topics of relevant papers. I also worked on the creation of a database of properties of carbide materials for aerospace purposes.
